alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 8:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bradford, southeastern Baker, northeastern Union, western Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 828 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Starke, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Raiford, Middleburg, Maxville, Oakleaf Plantation, Camp Blanding, Kingsley, Sampson, Lakeside and Penney Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval
